summary: Makes the balance spell less powerful.
descriptionHtml:
Just changes a few things with the paralysis spell.
Cast time: 10s
Effect Duration: 2s

Keep in mind that the specific NPC has to stand up again which gives you another 2 seconds of time to hit him. Just trying to keep the game hard and balanced.

Mass Paralysis has been changed also
Cast time: 10s
Effect Duration: 3s

Here is a video of how the spell usually works.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dxxiWdSNIko&feature=plcp
author: Samo187x
